notes: Postwar Dodge based on prewar design. Flathead inline-six engine. Fluid Drive semi-automatic transmission optional. Last year before major 1949 redesign. Vintage complexity requires period expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge automobile article, January 2025 revision.

All-new postwar design. Wayfarer was entry-level, Coronet top-line. First all-new Dodge since 1940. Modern styling replacing prewar look. Vintage service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Wayfarer article, January 2025 revision.
